snippet: The stresses of school exams and parenthood could crush any 21-year old, but Giovanni Classen seems to have found a way to make it work.
abstract: Educational Alliance, beneficiary of UJA-Federation of New York, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Giovanni Classen buy winter coats for himself and his 1-year-old son, as well as baby supplies.
lead_paragraph: The stresses of school exams and parenthood could crush any 21-year old, but Giovanni Classen seems to have found a way to make it work.

headline.main: College, Not Just for Himself, but for His Son
headline.print_headline: College, Not Just for Himself, but for His Son

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations
